name: NORTH AMERICAN MIDWAY ENTERTAINMENT, LLC
sampleDescriptions: relief funding for outdoor entertainment/large-gathering providers
H.R. 1319, American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 - provisions related to relief for the outdoor amusement/entertainment industry.
Implementation of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 and support for the outdoor amusement/entertainment industry.
Appropriations for businesses adversely affected by the pandemic and not served by relief programs already enacted

Seeking changes to PPP and other small business loan programs that serve businesses adversely affected by the pandemic, but haven't adequately served fairs, carnivals and other outdoor and mobile even
